steps.notes: Crush and grind coarse regolith to powder
Extract oxygen and produce metal byproduct via MRE

recipe_def.assumptions: Co-product metal alloy from MRE; refining not modeled.

steps.notes: Machine threads, ports, and sealing surfaces

recipe_def.assumptions: Casting, machining, and assembly chain to produce gas supply regulator
recipe_def.notes: Placeholder recipe to manufacture gas_supply_regulator from BOM components; refine BOM and process parameters as data becomes available.

steps.notes: Cast pipe segments and fittings from regolith metal.
Machine threads, deburr ends, and finish fittings.

recipe_def.assumptions: Small-batch piping components cast and machined from regolith metal.
recipe_def.notes: ISRU variant for piping components using regolith metal feedstock.

steps.notes: Crush and grind coarse regolith to powder
Extract oxygen and produce metal byproduct via MRE

recipe_def.assumptions: Co-product metal alloy from MRE; refining not modeled.

steps.notes: Cast enclosure panels and frame sections from regolith metal.
Machine panel edges, door openings, and mounting holes.
Assemble enclosure panels, hinges, and door hardware.

recipe_def.assumptions: Simplified cast-and-machine route for enclosure fabrication from regolith metal.
recipe_def.notes: ISRU variant for medium electrical enclosure using regolith metal feedstock.

steps.notes: Assemble gas handling, enclosure, and controls into a single system.
Leak check, purge validation, and oxygen sensor calibration.

recipe_def.notes: Basic assembly of the inert atmosphere system from BOM components; direct integration of gas handling and controls.
recipe_def.name: Recipe for inert atmosphere system
